languages.text: "Мы пошли в набег на ксеносов за пленными и угодили в западню. Без техники, с ранеными на руках, мы вынуждены были отступить. Я велел братьям уходить, а сам остался встречать гостей. Не знаю, скольких слабосильных убожеств я убил, но прикончил бы еще столько же, если бы их громоздившиеся стенами трупы не завалили меня".

"We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."
languages.original_text: "Мы пошли в набег на ксеносов за пленными и угодили в западню. Без техники, с ранеными на руках, мы вынуждены были отступить. Я велел братьям уходить, а сам остался встречать гостей. Не знаю, скольких слабосильных убожеств я убил, но прикончил бы еще столько же, если бы их громоздившиеся стенами трупы не завалили меня".

traits.locale_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no gear, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not collapsed on top of me."

"We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no gear, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not collapsed on top of me."

"We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no gear, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not collapsed on top of me."

"We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

languages.text: “我们当时去突袭异形，准备救出他们的俘虏，但却落入了陷阱。我们没有任何战争机械，一部分队员也受了伤，于是我们被迫撤退。我命令我的战友离开，而我留了下来，准备迎接我们的客人。我也不知道我究竟杀了多少不值一提的可怜虫。如果不是他们堆积如山的尸体妨碍了我的动作，我本可以杀得更多。”
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: “我们当时去突袭异形，准备救出他们的俘虏，但却落入了陷阱。我们失去了装备，一部分队员也受了伤，于是我们被迫撤退。我命令我的战友离开，而我留了下来，准备迎接我们的客人。我也不知道我究竟杀了多少不值一提的可怜虫。如果不是他们堆积如山的尸体砸在了我身上，我本可以杀得更多。”

languages.text: «Habíamos emprendido una incursión para capturar prisioneros xenos cuando caímos en una trampa. No teníamos máquinas de guerra apoyándonos y algunos miembros del escuadrón estaban heridos, así que nos vimos obligados a retirarnos. Ordené a mis hermanos de batalla que se marcharan mientras me quedaba a hacer frente a nuestros visitantes. No sé a cuántos de esos espantajos pusilánimes maté, pero habrían sido más si sus cadáveres amontonados no me hubieran entorpecido».
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: «Habíamos emprendido una incursión para capturar prisioneros xenos cuando caímos en una trampa. No teníamos equipo y algunos miembros del escuadrón estaban heridos, así que nos vimos obligados a retirarnos. Ordené a mis hermanos de batalla que se marcharan mientras me quedaba a hacer frente a nuestros visitantes. No sé a cuántos de esos espantajos pusilánimes maté, pero habrían sido más si sus cadáveres amontonados no hubieran caído sobre mí».

languages.text: 「異種族の囚人を追って、罠にはまった。力を貸してくれる兵器もなく、隊員は何人か傷を負って、やむを得ず撤退させたんだ。戦闘同胞には撤退命令を出したんだが、俺は客人を迎えるために残ったわけだ。手にかけた弱い連中の数は分からない。積み上げられた死体の山が戦闘の邪魔にならないなら、もっと殺していたな」
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の囚人を探しに行ったとき、罠にはまったんだ。装備もなく、隊員の何人かが負傷したため、撤退を余儀なくされた。俺は戦闘同胞に退去を命じたが、連中は客人を迎えるために残ってな。俺が何人の弱虫どもを殺したかは知らないが、そびえ立つ死体の山が崩れ落ちなければ、もっと殺していただろうよ」

languages.text: "Wir waren auf der Jagd nach Xenos-Gefangenen und sind in eine Falle getappt. Wir hatten keine Kriegsmaschinen zur Unterstützung, und ein Teil unseres Trupps war verwundet, daher mussten wir uns zurückziehen. Ich habe meinen Kampfbrüdern befohlen, zu gehen, bin jedoch zurückgeblieben, um unsere Gäste zu begrüßen. Ich weiß nicht, wie viele der schwachen Würmer ich getötet habe, doch es wären noch mehr gewesen, wenn der Berg ihrer Leichen mich nicht im Kampf behindert hätte."
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: "Wir waren auf der Jagd nach Xenos-Gefangenen und sind in eine Falle getappt. Wir hatten keine Ausrüstung, und ein Teil unseres Trupps war verwundet, daher mussten wir uns zurückziehen. Ich habe meinen Kampfbrüdern befohlen, zu gehen, bin jedoch zurückgeblieben, um unsere Gäste zu begrüßen. Ich weiß nicht, wie viele der schwachen Würmer ich getötet habe, doch es wären noch mehr gewesen, wenn der Berg ihrer Leichen nicht über mir zusammengebrochen wäre."

languages.text: « Nous cherchions des xénos à emprisonner et nous sommes tombés droit dans un piège. Nous n'avions pas de machines de guerre pour nous épauler et des membres de l'escouade étaient blessés. Nous n'avions d'autre choix que de battre en retraite. J'ai ordonné à mes frères de bataille de partir, mais je suis resté en arrière pour attendre l'ennemi. Je ne sais pas combien de ces misérables j'ai massacrés, mais j'en aurais sans doute tué bien plus si la pile de leurs cadavres n'avait pas fini par me gêner dans mes mouvements. »
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: « Nous traquions des xénos et nous sommes tombés droit dans un piège. Nous étions à court d'équipement et plusieurs membres de l'escouade étaient blessés. Nous n'avons eu d'autre choix que de battre en retraite. J'ai ordonné à mes frères de bataille de partir, mais je suis resté en arrière pour attendre l'ennemi. Je ne sais pas combien de ces vermines j'ai massacré, mais j'en aurais sans doute tué bien plus si la pile de leurs cadavres n'avait pas fini par me submerger. »

languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and we fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

languages.text: "Zeno esir almak üzere baskına çıkmıştık ki tuzağa düştük. Bize yardım edecek savaş makinelerimiz olmadığı ve mangamızdan birkaç kişi yaralandığı için geri çekilmek zorunda kaldık. Savaşdaşlarıma gitmelerini emrettim, bense düşmanı bekledim. Cılız köpeklerin kaçını katlettiğimi bilmiyorum ama o koca ceset yığınları savaşırken yolumu kapatmasaydı daha fazlasını öldürürdüm."
languages.original_text: "We had gone on a raid for xenos prisoners and fell into a trap. We had no war machines to support us, and some of our squad were wounded, so we were forced to retreat. I ordered my battle-brothers to leave, but I remained behind to meet our guests. I do not know how many of the feeble wretches I slew, but I would have killed even more had their towering piles of bodies not hindered me in combat."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno mahkûmlar için bir baskına giriştik ve tuzağa düştük. Bize yardım edecek savaş makinelerimiz olmadığı ve mangamızdan birkaç kişi yaralandığı için geri çekilmek zorunda kaldık. Silah kardeşlerime gitmelerini emrettim ama ben misafirimizle görüşmek için geride kaldım. Kaç tane cılız pisliği katlettiğimi bilmiyorum ama o koca ceset yığınları savaşırken beni engellemeseydi daha fazlasını öldürürdüm."
